properties.name: app.cors.allowed-origins
properties.description: Comma-separated list of allowed CORS origins

properties.name: app.jwt.secret
properties.description: Secret key for JWT token generation and validation

properties.name: app.rate-limit.auth.requests
properties.description: Maximum number of authentication requests allowed per time window

properties.name: app.rate-limit.auth.duration-seconds
properties.description: Duration of the rate limit time window in seconds
